footer.powered: The AI technology is powered by

description.1: Our AI-powered tool automatically generates a summary of any YouTube video
description.2: Just paste the link and get a summary in seconds

summarize.title: Summarize your videos

form.paragraph-1: For now you can only summarize one YouTube video at a time. Just paste the link to the video and click on Summarize.
form.paragraph-2: Then wait for the magic to happen. It may take a few minutes depending on the length of the video.
form.paragraph-3: We are working on a way to summarize multiple videos at once. Stay tuned!

summarize.ai_prompt: Provide a summary of this transcription, detailed enough not to require watching the video, but as concise as possible.
